Hi everyone, I did a quick (and lazy, sorry) search but came up empty: what are the general guidelines around creating a username? Thank you!

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, dumpster diver said:
> 
> 
> what are the general guidelines around creating a username?
> 

Basically, it's the same rules as for the rest of the forum (**Forum > Guidelines** at the top of the page, or click [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/guidelines/) if you're feeling lazy :)) The part that applies most to usernames is numbered 2.2.

> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, dumpster diver said:
> 
> 
> Hi everyone, I did a quick (and lazy, sorry) search but came up empty: what are the general guidelines around creating a username? Thank you!
> 

Avoid dirty words, religious and political references, and anything which might confuse people into thinking you are official. Of course people can avoid all those things and still manage to come up with something we can't allow, so this is not a comprehensive list. But it's the main points.
How long are mods on the forums? Do you have a quota for how many posts you have to check?

Until it's done. 

Or we have to go to work. 

No quotas.

You can post here:
